techmeme.title: Workday acquires Evisort, an AI-powered contract management service that had raised $155.6M in capital and debt (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Snap unveils new Spectacles it will lease to devs creating Snapchat AR lenses, with a more immersive display, longer battery life, and a more lightweight design (Alex Heath/The Verge)
Snapchat gets a redesign, simplifying from five to three tabs including a new unified For You feed of full-screen videos from publishers and creators (Alex Heath/The Verge)
Snap debuts a tool to let creators generate AI videos from text prompts and, soon, from image prompts, powered by Snap's own foundational video models (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
IBM acquires Kubecost, a FinOps startup launched in 2019 that helps companies monitor and optimize Kubernetes clusters; Kubecost had raised $30M+ in funding (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
